title: Lawn bowls
creator_credit: Don Smith and Queensland.Dept. of Education. Production Services Branch
brief_description: Designed to introduce and teach the skills of lawn bowls. Introduces the game, how and where it is played, the equipment and clothing used and provides a demostration of play and scoring. The second half presents a comprehensive overview of the basic techniques required.
